conversations.description: User uploads a video answering a product‑manager interview question, the system transcribes, scores voice confidence, and returns a detailed feedback report.
User provides a job description for a data‑science role, the AI parses it and generates a customized set of ten interview questions.
User records an audio answer to a behavioral question, the platform evaluates filler usage and suggests pacing improvements.
User submits a video of a technical coding interview, the system analyses facial expression for eye contact and gives a confidence rating.
User uploads a short audio clip, the AI compares the transcript to ideal keywords for a sales role and highlights missing points.
User inputs a senior‑engineer job posting, the AI extracts required skills and suggests three high‑impact interview prompts.
User records a mock interview for a marketing manager role, receives combined feedback on content relevance, vocal tone, and smile intensity.
User uploads a video of a remote interview, the platform flags moments of low eye contact and offers corrective exercises.
User provides a job ad for a UX designer, the system generates scenario‑based questions and assesses the user’s design‑thinking responses.
User submits an audio answer to a “strengths and weaknesses” question, receives a confidence score and suggestions to reduce nervous fillers.
User uploads a video of a case‑study interview, the AI evaluates pacing, pauses, and gives a narrative on how to structure answers better.
User pastes a job description for a financial analyst, the platform extracts key responsibilities and creates a personalized interview roadmap.
User records a response to a “why do you want this job?” question, the system matches phrasing against ideal keywords and grades relevance.
User provides a video of a panel interview, the AI aggregates facial‑cue scores across multiple judges and suggests improvements in nodding frequency.
User submits an audio file of a phone interview simulation, receives analysis of speech rate and advice on optimal tempo for clarity.
User inputs a job posting for a customer‑success role, the app parses required soft‑skills and generates situation‑behavior questions.
User uploads a video explaining a past project, the system assesses voice modulation and gives tips on emphasizing achievements.
User provides a transcript of an interview answer, the AI evaluates keyword coverage and suggests three additional points to incorporate.
User uploads a video for a leadership competency interview, receives feedback on confidence score, eye contact, and leadership‑specific phrasing.
User provides a job description for a remote developer role, the platform creates technical and cultural‑fit interview questions.
User records an answer to a “describe a conflict” question, the AI analyses tone for assertiveness and suggests more balanced phrasing.
User uploads a video of a presentation‑style interview, the system evaluates smile intensity and provides a report on audience engagement cues.
User inputs a job ad for a product analyst, the AI extracts key metrics required and generates data‑driven interview scenarios.
User records a mock interview for an entry‑level role, receives a beginner‑friendly confidence score with concrete breathing exercises.
User provides a video of a technical troubleshooting answer, the platform flags moments of hesitation and suggests smoother transitions.
User pastes a job description for a senior marketer, the AI parses brand‑strategy responsibilities and creates strategic question prompts.
User uploads an audio interview for a nonprofit position, receives feedback on empathy tone and volunteer‑experience relevance.
User records a response to a competency‑based question, the AI evaluates both content coverage and facial tension for stress levels.
User supplies a job posting for a data‑engineer, the system generates algorithm‑design questions and scores answer completeness.
User uploads a video of a mock HR interview, the AI analyses nodding frequency and provides a report on active listening cues.
User submits an audio answer to a “biggest achievement” question, the platform scores confidence and recommends stronger action verbs.
User inputs a job description for a remote support role, the AI extracts communication‑skill requirements and creates situational questions.
User records a response to a technical problem‑solving prompt, the system checks for key methodology keywords and offers refinements.
User uploads a video of a final‑round interview, receives a combined feedback report covering content, voice confidence, and facial expression.
User provides an audio file of a group‑interview simulation, the AI evaluates turn‑taking, filler usage, and suggests better pacing.
User pastes a job ad for a senior sales executive, the platform extracts target market keywords and generates persuasive pitch questions.
User uploads a video answering a “how do you handle failure?” question, the AI analyzes facial tension and suggests a more composed demeanor.
User records an answer for a product‑design interview, the system evaluates design‑thinking terminology usage and confidence score.
User provides a job description for a cybersecurity analyst, the AI parses required certifications and creates scenario‑based questions.
User uploads an audio interview for a junior developer, receives feedback on technical jargon clarity and vocal confidence.
User inputs a job posting for a content strategist, the platform extracts storytelling skill requirements and generates creative prompts.
User records a video of a mock interview for a consulting role, the AI measures eye contact consistency and offers posture tips.
User provides a transcript of a behavioral answer, the AI matches it against ideal competency keywords and highlights gaps.

User supplies a job description for an operations manager, the AI extracts process‑optimization responsibilities and creates situational questions.

User uploads a video of a remote interview for a data‑analyst, the system checks eye contact through the webcam and suggests lighting adjustments.
User supplies a job description for a legal associate, the AI extracts key qualification phrases and generates competency‑based interview questions.
